src.groovy.org.apache.ki.grails
Class AccessControlBuilder

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.org.apache.ki.grails.AccessControlBuilder

class AccessControlBuilder

This is the builder that handles the access control DSL used in controllers to specify role and permission settings.
